reference.title: Overview
reference.shortdesc: An is an enhanced next-generation platform core that has combined capabilities of numerous services.

section.p: Altair is a set of core fundamental services that let client applications define, modify, and share authoritative digital content representing virtual engineering meta-words.

An is a unique content management system that allows the modeling of complex digital through:
object inheritance, instancing
fine-grained level access control
metadata for search and classification
object linkage through relationships
capture behavior through actions
pub/sub-object lifecycle events

In the current environment, Domain Objects, Actions, Events, and Execution Environments everything can be modeled as an object. Actions like solving, result extraction or even file operations can be domain actions. Execute these in an environment like , Open Faas, or any other environment.
